availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander Gilmore (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, police chief)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, police chief. Native of Ireland. Married to Esther Smith Gilmore. Father of William Gilmore, Alexander Gilmore, Jr., Anna Gilmore, and Sarah Gilmore. Policeman in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Chief of the Louisville City Police Department in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 1, p. 181.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 1392.
"Alexander Gilmore (1806-1870," Find A Grave, Memorial 40451026, accessed June 26, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/40451026.
